diff.author: Truong Ha
diff.description: Create tables for Disease Registry program
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `dr_program` ( `dr_program_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `description` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `concept_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `updated_by` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `updated_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `retired` bit(1) default NULL, `retired_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `retired_by` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `retired_reason` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dr_program_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
